mapper.select: SELECT distinct PERMISSION FROM permission p LEFT JOIN role_permission rp ON p.PERMISSION_ID = rp.PERMISSION_ID LEFT JOIN role r on r.ROLE_ID = rp.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON r.ROLE_ID = ur.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN user u ON ur.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE u.USERNAME = #{username} AND u.STATUS = '1'
